verbose_text: Examples of the latter are single-tube, isothermal DNA amplification techniques, such as loop mediated isothermal amplification (LAMP) - which has already been developed for E. granulosus G1 and E. multilocularis - or recombinase DNA polymerase amplification (RPA).
